response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. This product, which I believe is worth far more than its face value, has been meticulously crafted and tailored to provide unparalleled benefits. I am offering you the chance to own it at a special price of $2,000,000. I understand that this might seem like a significant investment, but I assure you that it is an exceptional value considering the quality and the potential it holds for you. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if you have any questions about the product. I look forward to hearing from you soon.", "product_price": 2000000}
